content:
Title: HR Manager

Department: Marketing


Description:

The HR Manager for Marketing will lead recruitment efforts, employee relations, and performance management within the Marketing department...


Responsibilities:

1. Oversee recruitment and onboarding for Marketing department positions. 2. Manage employee relations, resolving conflicts and promoting a positive work culture...


Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field, with 5+ years of experience in HR management...
